channel.title: Suggestions
channel.description:
Hey guys.
Since my mum and dad want me to get a job, I came up with the idea to just do computer services for people that aren't that handy with computers. I'm not like a complete computer freak or something but I know what I'm doing and I just enjoy doing it. Oh well, getting a little off-topic, here's my concern:
I know my way around websites and programming them decently, I just need idea's to make my website look professional yet attracting. I plan on using Bootstrap to do that (I prefer Bootstrap above any other framework). It doesn't has to be like the best website, I just want it to look decent, professional and function well.
Please feel free to post any suggestions! I will keep this thread updated.
Thanks!

item.title: Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Scronix Scronix
item.description:
@Scronix wrote:

jal knight:

What kind of services are you offering? Is it local, remote or both? Do you have any ideas as for colors? A little more detail please:)

I’m doing local. I might move on to both later, but not yet. I’m thinking of light, fresh colors. I plan on using white and green :).

Read full topic
